content: Does anyone have any ideas about how to fix the 'There is no such a script' error that is often thrown by the test bots or the issue where it gives the wrong link to the test results? These make it very annoying sometimes to go see why tests failed.

Can't help you with Zen.ci, but for this (and other) reasons we have: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4351 If you'd like to give that a test, we can hopefully get it merged and start testing PRs with Tugboat instead/in addition to Zen.ci.

Use Tugboat.qa for PR sandboxes 路 Issue #4351 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the need We are considering using Tugboat.qa for PR sandboxes for Backdrop core (since that's Tugboat's advertised feature). Proposed solution Backdrop core will have a new, ...
